name: aibotkit-engineering
description: AI BotKit SaaS + WordPress plugin development workflows. 10 agents, 5 commands, 3 skills. Commands: /full-review (comprehensive multi-agent code review for SaaS and WordPress plugin), /next-phase (phased development lifecycle with discovery, gap analysis, and SDD methodology), /deploy-saas (deployment checklist and validation), /test-rag (RAG engine testing workflow), /sync-db (database synchronization workflow). Agents for: Next.js/React standards, RAG engine review, Drizzle schema, Stripe integration, WordPress plugin, security auditing, accessibility compliance, architecture review. Skills for: RAG development patterns, Next.js SaaS architecture, Drizzle ORM patterns.
